Class ChannelController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.audiofetch.afaudiolib.bll.colleagues.ChannelController

  • public class ChannelController
extends java.lang.Object
    Channel controller wraps logic surrounding changing between apbs

      Returns the array of discovered apbs

      Returns the audio mode for the active apb or the default of ControllerBase.MODE_STEREO Returns 1 for mono, 2 for stereo

      Returns a sorted list of all channels present within the current system

      Returns a ChannelReceivedEvent populated with channels and host count

      Return the sorted channels as an int array

      Returns the full channel list with no exclusions in the ranges This is useful if an AudioFetch unit has a broken channel

      Returns the number of hosts

      Returns true if the channel specified is within the ranges
      boolean hasChannels()
      Returns true if channels exist
